## file.exists() function

does a file exist at the path? note: returns false if the path exists but it is not a file

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function exists(path: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | <code>string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

true when the path is a file
